sentence.Network_en: The quantitative determination method of potassium ferrocyanide in edible salt is described in the paper.
sentence.Network_cn: 本方法采用蒸馏食用盐中亚铁氰化钾,吸收氰根,吡啶-吡唑啉酮显色定量测定.

sentence.Network_en: The author deals mainly with the ferrocyanide toning process, e . g . iron blue toning, copper red toning.
sentence.Network_cn: 本文介绍几种最常用的调色方法,着重阐述亚铁氰化物调色法, 如: 铁调蓝色法 、 铜调红色法.
